title: Chase Me
description: I want to be hunted.Chase me. Capture me. Ravage me.I should be ashamed of the words I’m typing but the online dating profile did ask me my dirtiest fantasy.And mine is dirty. Literally.But it’s a site made for kinky people, boasting sex as the foundation for a great relationship and god knows nothing else I’ve tried has worked.So why not this?I’ll be the prey, all I need now is the hunter. Chase Me is an erotic short story with themes of primal play, cnc, praise, degradation, denial, and BDSM. Please take caution while reading.
author: Natalia Lourose
